name: Ninja Run (itch) (wattnjp)
description:
ninja run, the game that contains only 1 stage to wins the game, seems easy, right? actually not. you need to help the ninja to find a way of mystery to reach the top of the temple tower within 300 seconds in order to achieve victory. if you fall to the void once or time out, you failed.

i made this project mainly cause i have no life. not really at all but the actual reason is im too lazy to touch the grasses outside. so i want to develop some games in order to find a clue that avoids going outside. i developed this game, kinda good clue i know. in process of making this, i surfed for some proper yt tutorials and dealing with some errors so.

after 2 days of sitting in front of my pc, i present to you. the ninja run. the game that no one plays it. lol

tutorial: use left, right button to control, space to jump. also you can jump if you hit the side of the platform.

(this game MIGHT can be played in windows only, i dont have any more devices in order to test to run the game from different operating system other than windows.)
